name: Anxiety Attack
description:
One day you were meditating/sleeping, because of all the stress and anxiety you have been having recently, when all of a sudden you found yourself transported to your inner mind-space where you met your conscience!

Can work with your conscience to eliminate your anxiety and beat your stress in this little action game?

  • LMB to shoot
  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • space to jump (watch out though, it's a little unreliable)
  • You can skip through the beginning text by clicking E or LMB

Made for Brakeys Jam 7 with the theme  "It Is Not Real". We tried to fit the theme by focusing on anxiety. Anxiety comes from worrying about things that could happen but have not yet. These events are "not real" and may never be real, hench the connection to the theme.
